14.content: Who me? Couldn't be. Then who?
14.title: Someone else in a different profession

choices: "Go lie down on that couch over there. Be perfectly still."
"I need to use the ladies' room, and you're coming along."
141.content:
So there you are, minding your own business in your cubicle, when your phone rings. Filled with dread, you pick up.

"May I please see you in my office?" a low, seductive, voice whispers on the other end.

"Y-yes ma'am, right away." You jump out of your chair and head for the elevator, fiddling with your tie. What could she possibly want this time?

On the top floor, you proceed down the corridor and knock on the door of the company's youngest (and most tyrannical) CEO, known to all as "Ms. Sandra".

"Come in."

You stare at your gorgeous superior. Chestnut brown hair, full lips, sexy glasses, a women's suit that accentuates her curves, a tone worthy of a phone sex operation...she has it all.

"Won't you sit down?"

You comply, covered in sweat. "What can I do for you, Ms. Sandra?"

"Well," she sighs, "It's rather complicated. I created a new position that only someone very special can fill."

"What position?"

Ms. Sandra lifts a figure, telling you to wait a minute, before leaning in her chair slightly. *BLLLLAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPT* A juicy, wet fart blasts out of her sculpted ass, sounding like it left a skidmark on the seat of her pants. "Excuse me," she says softly. "I've been watching you for a while now, and I think you'd be perfect for the position of...personal slave. I think your first assignment can start now."
141.title: Sandra, the Corporate CEO

choices: "...crawl under my desk and take what's coming to you."
"...follow me to the ladies room; I've got something for you."
1411.content:
"Go lie down on that couch over there. Be perfectly still," she orders gently.

I subtly flair my nostrils to see if her fart had a smell. Oh God! It did, like a sewer. I could not imagine what she eat to create such an unholy stench. My eyes involuntarily water as I look at her and smile; rising from my chair to comply with her demand. I lie down; my body crinkling and popping under her leather couch.

"You haven't really been wowing your supervisors," she begins to say, as she stands from her chair. When I turn my head I see she is already, or has always been, in her tiny panties; her black professional jacket, unbuttoned now, showing her lacy black bra. "You have to make waves to get noticed in this business."

"I know..."

"Don't interrupt me slave; see, luckily, I've noticed you." She's close to me now; she brings her face right next to mine and I can't help but be incredibly turned on by this; her lips practically touching mine but she wasn't kissing me. "I've seen your worth;" she starts as she turns around and plants her ass in my face. I'm caught totally off guard and try to throw her off but her weight keeps me trapped. "...under me, if you'll excuse the wordplay, you'll really start to be someone in this company."

PRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!

She ended her sentiments with a big wet fart; I felt the runaway juice spray against my nose as I recoiled from the stench of her release.

She laughed, as you'd expect an evil head of a corporation to do, as she grabbed her panties from her crack and pushed them aside. Then she sat down harder with my nose pressed up against her powerful asshole. It was slimy and the remnants of loose movements were apparent.

"I've had a pretty upset stomach today; lick my ass clean."

I thought for a moment about how I just wanted this to be over; how I longed for the moment back at my cubicle or to be home, eating a bowl of cereal and jerking off to thoughts about supervisor. I should quit once I get out of here; if I get out of here. No, she'd have to let me go eventually...right?

"I said, lick my ass slave!"

I repositioned to begin licking my bosses' ass but the taste of shit was more than I was able to handle; I gagged on it, then threw up as Ms. Sandra jumped off me and gave me a look of pure hatred and anger.

"What the fuck was that?! You can't eat your bosses ass; you gag on a little shit?! You're pathetic!"

I looked at her and channeled a moment of strength; "You can't do this to me! I quit."

I expected her face to turn to fear and concern; but instead she laughed.

"Really? You're going to risk it; there's no jobs out there. You're lucky to be employed right now so why don't you..."

14112.content:
As much as I hated to admit it, she was right. I probably couldn't find another job, not in this recession. So I followed her to the ladies room reluctantly, as soon as we were inside she tossed her soiled panties at my face.

"Since you have a problem with shit, we're going to train you to take it. You have two options, one lick my panties clean, or you can go with option two which involves you being on your knees with your mouth wide open."

141122.content:
It seemed like a slow and tedious hell to lick her panties; I wasn't one to prolong pain, I preferred to take it in one dreadful swallow. Oh, God; poor choice of words, me.

I was far too embarrassed to say either option; I just took a position on the floor, on my knees like a waiting, begging dog.

She smiled, "Brave little boy, we'll see if you're courage was misplaced," she said as she put her putrid ass crack over my face.

She moved my head and her ass to position my mouth to her asshole; I could feel the soft mucus pulsing against my lips.

PPRRRRBBBBBBFFFFFFFFFFFF! She laughed as she farted a steam of diarrhea into my mouth.

"Damn spicy omelets, always give me the runs; don't get any on my clothes or you'll choke my on shit. Got it!" She commanded, pushing again.

PRRRRRBBBBBB!

Just an airy fart to bake her shit against my face and torture my nose.

"I think this could become your new permant position; you'd like that wouldn't you," she strained on the last words and chuckled to herself as more of her shit drink filled my mouth; I couldn't take it, the smell, the taste.

I gagged repeatedly until finally I vomited; projectile, everywhere.

I was disoriented and sick but she kicked me in the face; I felt her heel dig into my scalp.

"You bitch! You got your puke all over my clothes! How the fuck am I supposed to go back out there?!"

I shruged innocently.

"Give me your pants."

"What will I do?"

"You?! I don't give a fuck! Just give me your pants!"

I remove my pants and give them to my boss; she quickly puts them on and heads to the exit.

"Actually," her tone is pleasant, "I do have something for you."
